title: Introduction of the First AI Impact Assessment and Future Tasks: South Korea Discussion
research_description: The article introduces the artificial intelligence impact assessment framework developed in South Korea. It discusses the assessment's scope, limitations, and the legal framework behind it, focusing on its applications in the public sector.
research_results: The study highlights that the AI impact assessment was limited to the public sector, voluntary in nature, and did not fully address environmental and human rights concerns. It suggests improvements such as extending the framework to the private sector and addressing societal impacts more comprehensively.
future_research: Future research should focus on developing a more detailed and mandatory AI impact assessment framework that includes private sector applications and emphasizes human rights and environmental impacts.
